title: my account isnt there anymore?

replies.body: im just gonna kill myself then since i cant play on my account now

someone please respond to my submitted ticket for my acount
ticket ##: 31689424

Are you connected to the right region on the login screen?  If you still have issues, reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll help you recover it!
i submitted a ticket, but beyond this i dont know what to do

Sit tight!  We aren't able to assist here through a public venue, but a member of our account team will reach out and help directly.  

By the way, it was a bit peculiar mentioning being able to log into other accounts not belonging to you.  Keep in mind that's not something we support.  If you've shared your account info in the past, I highly recommend you refrain from that and use our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to secure your info.  Account sharing is one of the quickest way to get it compromised or into unwanted trouble.  :/
the accounts i log into are specifically mine,never said they werent.
i said not mine, as in like grifspartan is my main account and the only one i use, the others are for back up,  or when i wanna do another climb idk why i made them
Gotcha!  Sorry for the confusion, just want to keep you safe!  :D
that was my bad, thank you for replying, itd be very upsetting to lose this account, league has helped me through some difficult times, and without this account i have no reason to play it really.
